sentences.en: However, red kojic red and gardenia blue have no antioxidant activity.

sentences.en: The pathogens causing red gardenia browning and rotting were Aspergillus niger v.

sentences.en: The stability of Gardenia red pigment was studied.
sentences.cn: 本文对栀子红色素做了较为全面的稳定性研究.

sentences.en: This paper reports a method of separation and determination of geniposide Gardenia jasminoides Ellis.
